name: pot_on_stove
description: True if the pot is on the stove.

name: stove_burner_on
description: True if the stove burner under the pot is on.

name: water_in_pot
description: True if water has been added to the pot.

name: water_boiling
description: True if water in the pot is boiling.

name: noodles_in_pot
description: True if noodles are in the pot.

name: garlic_prepared
description: True if garlic is peeled and cut.

name: spring_onions_prepared
description: True if spring onions are peeled and cut.

name: oil_in_pan
description: True if oil is in the pan.

name: ingredients_in_pan_cooked
description: True if pan ingredients (garlic, spring onions, noodles, soy sauce) are cooked and stirred.

name: noodles_drained
description: True if noodles have been drained.

name: food_on_plate
description: True if food is transferred to plate.

name: operator_holding
description: Object currently held by the operator. Should be marked as 'null' if no object is held.

name: gaze_target
description: Estimate target of the operator gaze. Should be marked as 'null' if no target is available.

name: steps_completed
description: A list of IDs for actions that have been successfully completed.

name: steps_in_progress
description: A list of IDs for actions that are currently being executed.

name: steps_available
description: A list of IDs for actions that can be started next, based on satisfied predecessors and state dependencies.
